title: Reconnect fail?
body:
My brother is having trouble trying to get league to start.
The champion select works fine. After it's closed, the actual game launcher won't show. If I click on the icon on my taskbar, it says "reconnect". Once I press it, it minimizes automatically but still no game launcher. If I click on the icon, it does the same thing with the "reconnect". I never seen the game launcher.

Please help.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6).
